plugin.name: OffsetView
plugin.description: Binary Ninja `BinaryView` to display a binary file with a nonzero base address.
plugin.longdescription: Open a file of machine code for analysis in a BinaryView that has a given base address. This allows pieces of code such as bootloaders and ROMs to be analyzed correctly without writing a custom view.
